Metadata.Title: Log Entries Include Event Time
Metadata.Author: Serge Batchilo, Jason Taylor, Joe Basirico

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 10.3.3

What to Check For

Log entries should include event date and time.

How to Check

Examine the logs to verify that log entries include event date and time.

How to Fix

Please refer to the vendor's documentation or technical support for instructions on how to change the log output settings.

Related Items

  • Implement Audit Trails for System Components
